availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: W. W. Crandell (Bullitt County, KY, farmer)

body.p: Bullitt County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married Catherine Ridgway Crandell in March 1836 in Bullitt County. Father of Mary A. Crandell, Thomas R. Crandell, James Crandell, Laura Crandell, Joseph Crandell, Nancy Crandell, and Charles Crandell. Resident in Bullitt County in 1850. Farmer in Bullitt County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bullitt County, p. 841
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bullitt County, p. 710
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, X County Marriages, Film #000482690, p. 159
